section.title: Run the resource optimizer
section.p: Use the resource optimizer to decrease the file size of images/audio/video. The resource optimizer can also be used to easily generate scaled images optimized for a lower resolution (like a 1024x576 netbook version of a 1280x720 visual novel).

section.title: Turn off debug mode
section.p: Uncheck debug in Build.jar or manually set debug to false in res/prefs-default.ini. If you want to disable the use of debug mode entirely, open res/game.ini and add the line debug=false.

section.title: Check customizations
section.p: Make sure you've customized everything you want:

ul.li: The default icon: res/icon.icns, res/icon.ico and res/icon.png.
The installer splash screen image: build-res/splash.png.
When creating an applet release: build-res/applet/header.jpg and build-res/applet/splash.jpg.

section.title: Test
section.p: Create a release using Build.jar and test it on a variety of operating systems.
